reading-1.title: Finding the Main Idea
reading-1.description: Learn to identify the central point in a text

reading-2.title: Making Inferences
reading-2.description: Read between the lines and understand implied meanings

reading-3.title: Understanding Context Clues
reading-3.description: Guess word meanings from surrounding context

reading-4.title: Identifying Supporting Details
reading-4.description: Find evidence that supports the main idea

reading-5.title: Recognizing Text Structure
reading-5.description: Understand how texts are organized and why

reading-6.title: Making Predictions
reading-6.description: Predict what will happen next in a text

reading-7.title: Summarizing
reading-7.description: Condense long texts into brief summaries

reading-8.title: Comparing and Contrasting
reading-8.description: Identify similarities and differences in texts

reading-9.title: Author's Purpose
reading-9.description: Understand why the author wrote the text

reading-10.title: Drawing Conclusions
reading-10.description: Form logical conclusions based on text evidence
